domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: CNN Newsroom
entity.description: "CNN Newsroom" presents the day's headlines and breaking stories live from CNN headquarters in Atlanta. The rotating cast of anchors and contributors includes Carol Costello, Kyra Phillips, Suzanne Malveaux, Brooke Baldwin, Don Lemon, Randi Kaye and Fredricka Whitfield.

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Anderson Cooper 360
entity.description: Anderson Cooper goes beyond the headlines with in-depth reporting and investigations. Through nightly "Keeping Them Honest" reports, Anderson keeps his commitment to holding those in power accountable. And, of course, there's the RidicuList, a tongue-in-cheek commentary on the day's news that may leave viewers (and Anderson) laughing. Joining him are guests that frequently include political and legal analysts.

text: @realDonaldTrump @foxandfriends @CNN Cadet Bone Spurs.....people are dying because they did not take your advice and drink lysol and bleach. People are dying because the coronavirus did not disappear like you said it would.. but that is ok because TV ratings are more important.
